Utils

The utils class contains methods to handle logging and printing in a global scale.

class model.utils.Utils(verbose: bool, logs: bool, dm: Optional[DataManager] = None)

Utility functions class.

Parameters

  • verbose – if verbose is active.

  • logs – if log generation is active.

  • dm – the current data manager instance.

with its functions

model.utils.Utils.verb_print(self, msg: str)

Prints the requested message if verbose is active.

Parameters

str – the message to be printed.

model.utils.Utils.write_log(self, msg: str)

Logs the requested message if logging is active

Parameters

str – the message to be logged.
